name: Tronetic Wars
description:
Note that this is not made by my formal company, Coder Realm but by a company, Galactic Brawlers in which I am partner head with Virat

It is a continuation to my story Tronetic Wars and this is my second game so it may have good things from the start

Story:After being thrown into the portal, Darkron came to another reality where it turned into a card and so did the other trons. Justin also came to this reality and formed a team to lure Darkron into the open. A newbie Ray has just joined them with his tron Gear but he have a lot to learn about his TRON....

Gameplay:The player will be learning about mysteries and fighting trons as the game progresses

Forum: http://tronwars.yuku.com

Few Things from dev:I am new in game dev and this is my second game. It is not completed so don't give comment that it is not complete.Please. Have fun with my game.;)
